H0.text: Lever is the most important part of a windmill, which has been used for farming in the United States for hundreds of years.

H1.text: Pulley is the most important simple machine part of a windmill that has been used for farming in the United States for hundreds of years.

H2.text: Inclined plane is the most important part of a windmill that has been used for farming in the United States for hundreds of years.

H3.text: The wheel and axle is the most important part of a windmill, which has been used for farming in the United States for hundreds of years.
